#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<set>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int lli;

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    long long int arr[n];
    long long int ans = 0;
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>arr[i-1];
        ans += (arr[i-1]-1)*i;
    }
    cin>>arr[n-1];
    ans += arr[n-1]*n;
    cout<<ans<<endl;
    return 0;
}
